scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/index.js -o dist/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -t cssify
scripts.dev: ./node_modules/.bin/beefy src/index.js:dist/index.js 3333 -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -t cssify
